entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls this morning. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Monday 3 April 2023
